name: Ciniva
overview:
CINIVA, founded in 1998, is one of the Mid-Atlantic region’s leading website design , business development , and Internet marketing organizations. While the majority of their clients are based in the Hampton Roads, Virginia area, they have worked with businesses and organizations throughout the state and all over the US.

Over the past decade they have created websites for state tourism boards, city governments, museums and historical landmarks, retail stores, and even a regional television series. Their clients have ranged from local businessmen targeting a specific region to national companies marketing to the world. Regardless of your budget or size, CINIVA can help you build a stunning online presence. They believe today’s small businesses can become tomorrow’s millionaires. Let us put the Web to work for you and give you that chance.
